languages.text: {n}Маражай кладет руку на оружие. Его голос звучит спокойно, однако взгляд, направленный на темную тварь, напряжен.{/n} "Ты напрасно выполз из бездны, что отребье вроде вас зовет домом. Считай нашу сделку расторгнутой: Назракей не выполнил того, что обещал, и я был вынужден доделывать все своими руками".

{n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай кладет руку на оружие. Его голос звучит спокойно, однако взгляд, направленный на темную тварь, напряжен.{/n} "Ты напрасно выполз из бездны, что отребье вроде вас зовет домом. Считай нашу сделку расторгнутой: Назракей не выполнил того, что обещал, и я был вынужден доделывать все своими руками".

Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pose une main sur son arme. Sa voix reste calme, mais son regard s'intensifie alors qu'il observe la sombre créature devant lui.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû sortir de l'abîme dans lequel votre misérable espèce s'est réfugiée. Considérez que notre pacte est rompu. Nazrakhei n'a pas respecté sa part du marché, j'ai dû finir le travail moi-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pose une main sur son arme. Sa voix reste calme, mais son regard s'intensifie alors qu'il observe la sombre créature devant lui.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû sortir de l'abîme dans lequel votre misérable espèce s'est réfugiée. Considérez que notre pacte est rompu. Nazrakhei n'a pas respecté sa part du marché, j'ai dû finir le travail moi-même. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋将手搭在武器上。尽管他的声音听起来很平静，但当他凝视着眼前这只黑暗的生物时，他的目光充满了紧张的意味。{/n}“你真不该爬出你们那可怜的巢穴。就当我们的协议已经失效了吧，纳札骸并没有履行过他的承诺，我不得不亲自动手。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋将手搭在武器上。尽管他的声音听起来很平静，但当他凝视着眼前这只黑暗的生物时，他的目光充满了紧张的意味。{/n}“你真不该爬出你们那可怜的巢穴。就当我们的协议已经失效了吧，纳札骸并没有履行过他的承诺，我不得不亲自动手。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが武器に手をかけた。その声は穏やかに聞こえるが視線は緊張しており、目の前の黒い生き物を凝視している。{/n}「お前は這い出るべきじゃなかったんだよ。お前のような惨めな種族が故郷と呼ぶ深淵からは。俺たちの盟約は破られたと思ってくれ。ナズラクヘイが約束を果たさなかったために、俺は自分で仕事を片づける必要があったんだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが武器に手をかけた。その声は穏やかに聞こえるが視線は緊張しており、目の前の黒い生き物を凝視している。{/n}「お前は這い出るべきじゃなかったんだよ。お前のような惨めな種族が故郷と呼ぶ深淵からは。俺たちの盟約は破られたと思ってくれ。ナズラクヘイが約束を果たさなかったために、俺は自分で仕事を片づける必要があったんだよ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai legt eine Hand auf seine Waffe. Seine Stimme klingt ruhig, aber sein Blick ist angespannt, als er die dunkle Kreatur vor ihm ansieht.{/n} "Ihr hättet nicht aus dem Abgrund kriechen sollen, den Ihr jämmerlichen Kreaturen Euer Zuhause nennt. Unser Pakt ist hiermit gebrochen. Nazrakhei hat seinen Teil der Abmachung nicht eingehalten, also musste ich die Aufgabe alleine erledigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai legt eine Hand auf seine Waffe. Seine Stimme klingt ruhig, aber sein Blick ist angespannt, als er die dunkle Kreatur vor ihm ansieht.{/n} "Ihr hättet nicht aus dem Abgrund kriechen sollen, den Ihr jämmerlichen Kreaturen Euer Zuhause nennt. Unser Pakt ist hiermit gebrochen. Nazrakhei hat seinen Teil der Abmachung nicht eingehalten, also musste ich die Aufgabe alleine erledigen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai posa una mano sobre su arma. Su voz es serena, pero su expresión se tensa al escudriñar a la tenebrosa criatura que tiene delante.{/n} «No deberías haber salido arrastrándote del abismo que tu desdichada especie llama hogar. Considera nuestro pacto roto. Nazrakhei no ha cumplido su parte del trato, así que he tenido que terminar el trabajo yo mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai posa una mano sobre su arma. Su voz es serena, pero su expresión se tensa al escudriñar a la tenebrosa criatura que tiene delante.{/n} «No deberías haber salido arrastrándote del abismo que tu desdichada especie llama hogar. Considera nuestro pacto roto. Nazrakhei no ha cumplido su parte del trato, así que he tenido que terminar el trabajo yo mismo».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, elini silahının üzerine koyuyor. Sesi oldukça sakin çıksa da önündeki karanlık yaratığa bakan gözleri son derece gergin.{/n} "Kahrolası türünün yuvam dediği o hiçlikten hiç çıkmamalıydın. Nazrakhei, anlaşmanın kendi üzerine düşen kısmını yerine getirmedi. Ben de işi kendim bitirmek zorunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai places a hand on his weapon. His voice sounds calm but his gaze is tense as he peers at the dark creature before him.{/n} "You should not have crawled out of the abyss that your wretched kind call home. Consider our pact broken. Nazrakhei did not hold up his end of the bargain, so I had to finish the job myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai elini silahının üzerine koyuyor. Sesi oldukça sakin çıkıyor ancak önündeki karanlık yaratığa bakan gözleri son derece gergin.{/n} "Senin kahrolası türünün yuvam dediği o hiçlikten hiç çıkmamalıydın. Nazrakhei anlaşmanın üzerine düşen kısmını yerine getirmedi, ben de işi kendim bitirmek zorunda kaldım."
